2.label: Switch Type for Relay 1 (Sw1)
2.description: Choose the wall switch type you want to connect to the Sw1 terminal.

options.label: Garage door (momentary mode for Z-Wave control)

3.label: Switch Type for Relay 2 (Sw2)
3.description: Choose the wall switch type you want to connect to the Sw2 terminal.

options.label: Garage door (momentary mode for Z-Wave control)

4.label: Switch Type for Relay 3 (Sw3)
4.description: Choose the wall switch type you want to connect to the Sw3 terminal.

options.label: Garage door (momentary mode for Z-Wave control)
On when all relays are off
On when any relays is on

6.label: Auto Turn-Off Timer for Relay 1
6.description: Sets the time after which you want relay 1 to automatically turn off once it has been turned on, using the unit defined in parameter 15.

7.label: Auto Turn-On Timer for Relay 1
7.description: Sets the time after which you want relay 1 to automatically turn off once it has been turned on, using the unit defined in parameter 16.

8.label: Auto Turn-Off Timer for Relay 2
8.description: Sets the time after which you want relay 1 to automatically turn off once it has been turned on, using the unit defined in parameter 17.

9.label: Auto Turn-On Timer for Relay 2
9.description: Sets the time after which you want relay 1 to automatically turn off once it has been turned on, using the unit defined in parameter 18.

10.label: Auto Turn-Off Timer for Relay 3
10.description: Sets the time after which you want relay 1 to automatically turn off once it has been turned on, using the unit defined in parameter 19.

11.label: Auto Turn-On Timer for Relay 3
11.description: Sets the time after which you want relay 1 to automatically turn off once it has been turned on, using the unit defined in parameter 20.

12.label: Enable/Disable Manual Control for SW1
12.description: Determine whether you can control the indicated switch manually.

options.label: Local control disabled with enable on/off reports

13.label: Enable/Disable Manual Control for SW2
13.description: Determine whether you can control the indicated switch manually.

options.label: Local control disabled with enable on/off reports

14.label: Enable/Disable Manual Control for SW3
14.description: Determine whether you can control the indicated switch manually.

options.label: Local control disabled with enable on/off reports

15.label: Auto Turn-Off Timer Unit for Relay 1
15.description: Choose between second, minutes, and hours as the unit for Auto Turn-Off time for Relay 1.

16.label: Auto Turn-On Timer Unit for Relay 1
16.description: Choose between second, minutes, and hours as the unit for Auto Turn-On time for Relay 1.

17.label: Auto Turn-Off Timer Unit for Relay 2
17.description: Choose between second, minutes, and hours as the unit for Auto Turn-Off time for Relay 2.  Default: minutes

18.label: Auto Turn-On Timer Unit for Relay 2
18.description: Choose between second, minutes, and hours as the unit for Auto Turn-On time for Relay 2.

19.label: Auto Turn-Off Timer Unit for Relay 3
19.description: Choose between second, minutes, and hours as the unit for Auto Turn-Off time for Relay 3.

20.label: Auto Turn-On Timer Unit for Relay 3
20.description: Choose between second, minutes, and hours as the unit for Auto Turn-On time for Relay 3.
